item.description:
Saw this idea and wanted to schedule it after seeing the beautiful course online. I have booked a tee time for 4 at 2:10pm, if there's more interest I'll see about booking another tee time for 4 more close to the same time. Reservation is under my last name, Robbins when you check in. This is booked for the North course.

Thanks for the idea Christopher!

-Chuck
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at clubhouse/or starting point 15 min before tee time!

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Stowe Acres Country Club - Stow, MA (North course)
